name: quran-cli
description: Nodejs command line interface (CLI) for querying, searching and showing Quran text in many languages. The source of quranic text files are taken from http://tanzil.net.

scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.git-push: git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run git-commit && npm run git-push

author: stardigits
